uiDefinition.description: The API Key (in the form 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY') for this api
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide your API Key (in the form 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY')

properties.description: Passage is backed by 1Password's 17+ years of industry-leading security expertise. Completely replace your existing authentication flow or build from scratch with a robust solution for passwordless authentication and customer identity management. Realize the full security, business, and user experience benefits of eliminating passwords by implementing login flows powered by passkeys, magic links, and login codes.
